EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Application Modernization with Cloud Flexibility
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Application Modernization with Cloud Flexibility <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/application-modernization-with-cloud-flexibility]]> white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this eBook, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-application-modernization-with-cloud-flexibility]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
